name: Rat Fashion (cnitahara)
description:
Rat Fashion is a simple matching game in which the player helps a rat dig through the "trash" for various accessories. It is reminiscent of mini games played on handheld consoles, and pushing new high-scores.

Match one side of the screen at a time, looking for the accessory shown in the center bar. Find a pair of identical objects to get a match. Multiple matches in a row will make a combo, increasing your score.

Controls: Arrow keys to move selection, Spacebar to select
